document.title: Reference for `attribute_exists'
document.paragraph:
2SYNOPSYS
#include "eif_cecil. h"
EIF_BOOLEAN attribute_exists (EIF_REFERENCE object , char * name );
2DESCRIPTION The attribute_exists() macro returns EIF_TRUE or EIF_FALSE when the attribute of name name exists in the Eiffel object (reference) ref .
2RETURN VALUE
EIF_TRUE or EIF_FALSE.
2CONFORMANCE ISE Eiffel 4. 5 and later.
2SEE ALSO
eif_attribute (1). Markup created by 1. 0, November 15, 1999.
